tool_description: You can reach the pharmacies or chemists/chemist shops available in India. You can get name, address, location information, etc.
name: Indian Pharmacy
title: Indian Pharmacy

api_list.name: search by PIN
api_list.description: search chemist shop/pharmacy by city pin code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-pharmacy.p.rapidapi.com/pin/152116"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-pharmacy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-pharmacy.p.rapidapi.com/pin/{pin_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-pharmacy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Find by ID
